Jun 2024 ‚Ä¢ Friends

Reliable service

It's really reliable service. Claudia told me all the process to meet with a driver via whatsapp. She is very responsible. I didn't have any problems during my trip, but if I had something, she would sort it out immediately.

Reliable transfer from airport hotel

Sep 2023 ‚Ä¢ Couples
We had booked the transfer from the airport to the hotel. Everything went smoothly and on time. The driver was very friendly.
The communication beforehand with the agency (including Diego) was also very good (fast, competent, honest). It's a shame that we were only in Lima for a short time, otherwise we would definitely have done more with the agency :-)
Written September 23, 2023
